net.openhft.chronicle.logger

Class ChronicleLogConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.logger.ChronicleLogConfig

  • public class ChronicleLogConfig
extends Object
    Author:
    lburgazzoli Configurationn example: # default chronicle.logger.base = ${java.io.tmpdir}/chronicle/${today}/${pid} # logger : root chronicle.logger.root.type = vanilla chronicle.logger.root.path = ${chronicle.logger.base}/root chronicle.logger.root.level = debug chronicle.logger.root.shortName = false chronicle.logger.root.append = false chronicle.logger.root.format = binary chronicle.logger.root.serialize = false # logger : Logger1 chronicle.logger.Logger1.path = ${chronicle.logger.base}/logger_1 chronicle.logger.Logger1.level = info
